STATCOM (Statistics in the Community) is a student organization of the the Columbia Biostatistics department aiming to provide statistical consultation on a volunteer basis to organizations in the New York City area. Through participation students benefit by gaining hand on experience while providing service to our local community. 

<p>

STATCOM is lead by Columbia Biostatistics students [Maddie Stoms](https://www.linkedin.com/in/madison-stoms-597155127/), [Charly Fowler](https://www.linkedin.com/in/charlotte-fowler-2a86b71a0/), Steven Lawrence, and [Muhire Kwizera](https://www.linkedin.com/in/muhire-honorine-kwizera-96253583/) with the help of faculty advisor [Cody Chiuzan](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/people/our-faculty/cc3780). 

</p>
